alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 03 at 6:34AM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Patchy Areas of Dense Fog Possible Through 9am... Patches of fog...some locally dense...have developed across portions of the area. Visibilities are likely to be reduced to around 1 mile in general, with localized areas experiencing reduced visibilities to one-half of a mile at times. If lower visibilities materialize, a dense fog advisory will be needed. Motorists are advised to drive with caution this morning as visibilities may widely vary over short distances. Use low beam headlights and leave extra distance between your vehicle and others on the road when encountering significant reductions in visibility. Allow extra time to travel to destinations.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Inland Palm Beach County
